step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are spread wide.
You're doing well with the arm movement. Focus on making a firm fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale during this part.
Great job extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Continue to relax your muscles during this phase.
Your arm extension is good. Keep focusing on a strong fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale.
Excellent work relaxing and exhaling as you stretch your arms back overhead. This completes one repetition.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Keep up the good work of stretching your arms overhead and making a strong fist as you push down. Remember to breathe with each movement.
